headline: Occidental Petroleum (OXY) Declines More Than Market: Some Information for Investors
summary: Occidental Petroleum (OXY) reached $47.19 at the closing of the latest trading day, reflecting a -1.19% change compared to its last close.

headline: Use These Stock Chart Signals to Find Winning Options Trades
summary: Gavin McMaster explains how to screen for options trades using bearish and bullish engulfing candlestick patterns layered on top of options flow.

raw.headline: Use These Stock Chart Signals to Find Winning Options Trades

headline: Occidental Petroleum (OXY) Is Up 5.8% After Slashing Debt and Expanding Into Carbon Capture - Has the Bull Case Changed?
summary: Occidental Petroleum recently reduced its debt burden by US$7.5 billion over the past 13 months, decreased annual interest expenses by US$410 million, and announced the planned launch of the Stratos direct air capture facility aimed at expanding into the fast-growing carbon credit market. The company's intensified cost-cutting measures and asset divestitures highlight refocused efforts to boost liquidity and operational efficiency, while entering carbon management signals a diversification...
